Package com.sovren.exceptions

Class SovrenException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
com.sovren.exceptions.SovrenException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SovrenUsableJobException, SovrenUsableResumeException
public class SovrenException
extends java.lang.Exception
The most generic exception thrown by the SDK as a result of an error response from the API
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int HttpStatusCode
    The HTTP Status Code of the response.
    java.lang.Exception InnerException
    If this exception was caused by another exception, the root cause will be here.
    java.lang.String RequestBody
    The JSON request body, will only have a value if SovrenClient.ShowFullRequestBodyInExceptions is true
    okhttp3.Response RestResponse
    The raw response from the API
    java.lang.String SovrenErrorCode
    The Info.Code of the response.
    java.lang.String TransactionId
    The Id of the transaction, use this when reporting errors to Sovren Support

  • Field Details

    • RestResponse

      public okhttp3.Response RestResponse
      The raw response from the API

    • HttpStatusCode

      public int HttpStatusCode
      The HTTP Status Code of the response. See https://docs.sovren.com/api/rest/#http-status-codes

    • SovrenErrorCode

      public java.lang.String SovrenErrorCode
      The Info.Code of the response. This will indicate what type of error occurred. See https://docs.sovren.com/api/rest/#http-status-codes

    • TransactionId

      public java.lang.String TransactionId
      The Id of the transaction, use this when reporting errors to Sovren Support

    • RequestBody

      public java.lang.String RequestBody
      The JSON request body, will only have a value if SovrenClient.ShowFullRequestBodyInExceptions is true

    • InnerException

      public java.lang.Exception InnerException
      If this exception was caused by another exception, the root cause will be here.

  • Constructor Details

    • SovrenException

      public SovrenException​(java.lang.String requestBody, okhttp3.Response response, ApiResponseInfo errorInfo)
